attributes.action: prevent police from having the ability to screen e-mails, texts and phone calls.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The 'Big Brother' effect,

Surveillance or Stalking?
Saftey or Suspicion?

Could you honestly walk around knowing that every step you take, someone is monitoring your every move, every text, every e-mail, every phone call..
surely we are all entitled to privacy?

Privacy is a right, NOT a luxury,
you cannot take it away from someone.
Our previous prime minister's attempt control over this country has left us with nothing but a failing empire, he made a mess, and has left it in the hands of our current prime minister to 'fix it'.
